name: Makarov PM
description: The Pistolet Makarova was developed by the Soviet Union to replace the WWII-era TT-33 pistol.  It uses the 9x18mm cartridge, which remains in active use among various former Soviet countries.

name: Tokarev TT-33
description: The Tokarev TT-33 is a WWII-era Russian semiautomatic pistol, famous for its durability, accuracy, and uncomfortable grip angle.  It was chambered for the 7.62x25mm due to the popularity of the C96 pistol among Russian revolutionaries.
